title: Ecstasy
blurb: Poems spiritual in nature by Michele Cuomo and Bonnie Bostrom
description: Michele Cuomo and I discovered a mutual appreciation for saints. We both have written poems, spiritual in nature, and want to share them with people who mighty share our taste. Many have been written previously and published so we include some of those. We are admittedly eclectic so if this sounds intriguing, this book is for you.
